column5: If your wife ever questions your sanity or spending... just tell her you're getting ready for an alternate career as a phone repair guy!
Get a little close with the plow?
I tried that one already, she didn't buy it,
Yep.. after 50" of snowfall in 2 days it's easy to lose track where stuff is!
I have always thought I'd use my ground blind to do the same to thaw ground if I needed into my sewage pump chamber or septic tank lid in the winter.
Nicely done with the setup and the repair!
They make a good winter camping out house too!!!
That's what happens when you want to play snow plow man.LOL
They make a good winter camping out house too!!!     Wow this looks amazing!!!!!!  Can I be your friend?
Wow this looks amazing!!!!!!  Can I be your friend?
